title: Dishes
description: Gather, wash, dry and put away all the dishes.

title: Laundry
description: Gather all the dirty laundry and put run it through the washer and dryer. When it's done, fold it and put it away.

title: Change sheets
description: Take all the sheets off the bed and wash them, dry them, then put them back on the bed.

title: Mop the floor
description: Sweep, vacuum, then mop the whole floor, then put away the mop and wash the mop head.

title: Cat Litter
description: Throw away cat poop daily, replace the cat litter once a week. Sweep around the area.
